channel.title: Need a 24/7 hoster!
channel.description: ok i post some picture's here but i also need to let you know if your not 24.7 dont bother looking at this topic idc if ur 23.7 i want 24.7. My msn is maxacollins@gmail.com and this server was hosted last night not be a 24/7 but was only for 4 hours and we got 20 players onlne and 60 registered accouns in 4 hours.. if you dont believe add my msn we will put online for 2-4 hours and ill proove.. cause it was at night when this was hosted and we got those players so during the day will be more popular.. here are the pic's thanks for looking

item.title: Need a 24/7 hoster!

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Requesting a hoster/coder is not allowed. Sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a 24/7 hoster!
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:5, topic:388278”]How is it not “fair”? There are rules.
It’s not fair if I can’t sell accounts I make, is it?
It’s to prevent a huge shitstorm of “he scammed me”, “no I didn’t”, “yes you did”, “oh yeah prove it”, etc.

i can host 24/7 i added you on msn accept it.

No you can’t. I just said it was against the rules.[/quote]
actually i can care less if they take my files… im not a nerd… its a freaking game honestly i just do this for donations…

Read full topic
